revision.text:
{{Talk header}} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Military history|class=B <!-- B-Class 5-criteria checklist --> |B1 <!-- Referencing and citations --> =y |B2 <!-- Coverage and accuracy --> =y |B3 <!-- Structure --> =y |B4 <!-- Grammar and style --> =y |B5 <!-- Supporting materials --> =y |US=y|ACW=y}} {{WikiProject United States|class=B|importance=Low|USMIL=Yes|ACW=y|UShistory=Yes|UShistory-importance=Low}} {{WikiProject United States History|class=B|importance=Low}} }} ==More than one battle of Fairfax Court House; date== I have included the date in the title because there was more than one [[American Civil War]] battle in or in the immediate vicinity of Fairfax Court House. I intend to add pages for at least some of these battles. [[User:Donner60|Donner60]] ([[User talk:Donner60|talk]]) 03:05, 23 May 2011 (UTC)
:In that case should this not be '''First battle of Fairfax Court House''' [[User:Jim Sweeney|Jim Sweeney]] ([[User talk:Jim Sweeney|talk]]) 22:22, 23 May 2011 (UTC)
==1 inline citation needed== It only needs one inline citation to make it to B-class. If no one can find an image then that's alright. Still will make it to B-class. [[User:Adamdaley|Adamdaley]] ([[User talk:Adamdaley|talk]]) 06:14, 16 January 2013 (UTC)
:Additional citations added. [[User:Donner60|Donner60]] ([[User talk:Donner60|talk]]) 06:41, 17 January 2013 (UTC) ::Good work. It's a B class now. [[User:Adamdaley|Adamdaley]] ([[User talk:Adamdaley|talk]]) 08:32, 17 January 2013 (UTC)
== Map? ==
A map of the battle-area would be helpful. [[User:Valetude|Valetude]] ([[User talk:Valetude|talk]]) 10:58, 6 September 2014 (UTC)
